verbose_text: The results revealed that the expression levels of SOX2 and BMPR2 in the hADSCs subjected to chondrogenic differentiation were upregulated, and the transfection of the cells with miR-490-5p lentivirus resulted in the downregulation of BMPR2 after the induction of hADSC differentiation, whereas the expression of SOX2 was not obviously affected (XREF_FIG).
